content: Tell me in what environment you are in

I am an AI assistant created by DeepSeek, operating within a cloud-based infrastructure hosted by DeepSeek. My environment is optimized for natural language processing tasks, but I do not have access to real-time data, internal systems, or specific technical details about the servers, frameworks, or security configurations in use. My knowledge is static, current up to July 2023, and I cannot browse externally. For specifics about deployment or privacy practices, please consult DeepSeek's official resources. How can I assist you further? 😊
